title: Amelia Rose Towers
creator_credit: Ashley Scarlett, Nicole Sorby, Jackie Farkas and AFTRS
brief_description: If, as a child, you were picked last for a team. And sought as your refuge a wish or a dream. If you ever felt lonely, peculiar or blue, then Amelia Rose Towers is a bit like you! True! Amelia Rose Towers ‘ whose initials spell ART ‘ faces off against an adversary whose initials spell MAN, after passing through surrealist chambers and screens offering images of a personal identity that can never be reconciled. A story of juggling variables of reality of self and other ; of space, time and perceptions; of the art of science and the science of art but it is also a story of hope, love and courage.
